block.p: DEERE & CO., Moline, Ill., named Robert W. Lane, president and chief executive, to the additional post of chairman, succeeding Hans W. Becherer, who is retiring.
HALFTHEPLANET.COM, New York, named Patricia E. Vance president and chief executive. She had been senior vice president at the ABC Internet Group.
DEERE & CO., Moline, Ill., named Robert W. Lane, president and chief executive, to the additional post of chairman, succeeding Hans W. Becherer, who is retiring.
HALFTHEPLANET.COM, New York, named Patricia E. Vance president and chief executive. She had been senior vice president at the ABC Internet Group.

MOLEX, Lisle, Ill., named J. Joseph King, president and chief operating officer, to the posts of vice chairman and chief executive. He succeeds John and Fred Krehbiel, co-chairmen, who had served as co-chief executives. Martin Slark, executive vice president, succeeds Mr. King as president and chief operating officer.

ZALE CORP., Dallas, named Beryl Raff, chief executive, to the additional post of chairman, succeeding Robert J. DiNicola, who is retiring. Alan Shor, chief operating officer, succeeds Ms. Raff as president.
